bike.description: A6-SL alloy w/ semi-integrated tapered headset w/ 1 1/2" lower bearing, hydroformed top and down tube, water bottle mount. Rear triangle: A6-SL alloy w/ low leverage suspended rockers, FSR 120mm travel, cold forged dropout w/ CNC'D disc mount and replaceable hanger, sealed bearing pivots

components.description: RockShox XC 32 TK disc tapered alloy steerer w/ lockout, 120mm travel
Shimano Deore SGS, direct mount top normal, 10-speed
Fuji custom 32H mountain hubs, Alex double wall rims
Continental Mountain King 26x2.2" folding or Hutchinson Cobra 26x2.25"
Tektro Draco hydraulic disc, 180/160mm SL rotor
Oval M200 alloy riser bar, 15mm rise, 9Â° sweep, 31.8mm, 680mm wide
Oval M200 alloy reverse bolt technology, 31.8mm
